title: Witchaven Dungeon

properties.value: The Witchaven Dungeon is a dangerous dungeon in Witchaven that players with low-medium combat levels should not enter without a very good amount of food. The quickest way to get to Witchaven dungeon would be using Ardougne Teleport or the tablet then head east. The other option is to use the fairy ring code blr and head south.

Witchaven Dungeon
Released9 April 2002 (Update)
MembersYes
Floors1
LocationKandarin
InhabitantsHobgoblins, ogres, hellhounds
MusicEscape
Map
Advanced data
Typedungeon
Witchaven dungeon map.

The Witchaven Dungeon is a dangerous dungeon in Witchaven that players with low-medium combat levels should not enter without a very good amount of food. The quickest way to get to Witchaven dungeon would be using Ardougne Teleport or the tablet then head east. The other option is to use the fairy ring code blr and head south.

Contents

  • 1 Main section
    • 1.1 The Puzzle
  • 2 Secret section
  • 3 Monsters
  • 4 Personalities
  • 5 Music
  • 6 Quests
  • 7 Changes

Main section[edit | edit source]

When you enter the dungeon, you will come into a room containing aggressive level 28 hobgoblins. To the north lies a section which leads into 3 rooms. The north and south rooms contain level 53 ogres. The east room contains a few hellhounds, which you are able to cannon. This section of the dungeon is a key part in the Family Crest quest for obtaining 'perfect' gold ore.

The Puzzle[edit | edit source]

To enter the section of the dungeon containing the hellhounds, you will first have to solve a lever puzzle. The following is a set of instructions on how to gain access to the room with the hellhounds.

(If you log out at any point before completing the puzzle, you will have to start over.)

  1. Head to the northern lever located outside the room and pull it up.
  2. Head to the southern Lever, located inside the room and pull it up.
  3. Return to the northern lever and pull the lever outside the room down.
  4. Enter the northern room and push the lever in there up.
  5. Leave the room and pull the one outside the northern room up.
  6. Go back to the southern room and pull the inside lever down.
  7. Now you are free to enter the room with the hellhounds.

Note: You only have to do the puzzle once to gain access to the hellhounds. If you leave and come back much later you can simply walk into the room via the door and it will not be locked.

Secret section[edit | edit source]

The secret section is discovered during The Slug Menace. This part of the dungeon is filled with level 45 giant lobsters. Players fight a level 62 Slug Prince later in the quest near the end of the hall. There is also an Agility shortcut, which makes passage through the dungeon much quicker. Finally, at the very end of the dungeon is Mother Mallum's lair. The Slug Queen's lair vaguely resembles a bed and is probably where she stayed throughout her years of imprisonment.

Monsters[edit | edit source]

  • Hobgoblin
  • Giant lobster
  • Ogre
  • Slug Prince (may only be fought once)
  • Hellhound

Personalities[edit | edit source]

  • Mother Mallum (only during The Slug Menace)

Music[edit | edit source]

  • Escape
  • Slug a Bug Ball

Quests[edit | edit source]

The following quests are involved with the dungeon:

  • The Slug Menace
  • Family Crest

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
28 April 2016
(update | poll)

More Hellhound spawns have been added to the Witchhaven dungeon.

[[File:Witchaven dungeon map.png|thumb|Witchaven dungeon map.]]
The '''Witchaven Dungeon''' is a dangerous [[List of dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Witchaven]] that players with low-medium [[combat level]]s should not enter without a very good amount of [[food]]. The quickest way to get to Witchaven dungeon would be using [[Ardougne Teleport]] or the [[Ardougne teleport|tablet]] then head east. The other option is to use the [[Fairy rings|fairy ring]] code {{Fairycode|blr}} and head south.

==Main section==
When you enter the dungeon, you will come into a room containing aggressive level 28 [[hobgoblin]]s. To the north lies a section which leads into 3 rooms. The north and south rooms contain level 53 [[ogre]]s. The east room contains a few [[hellhound]]s, which you are able to cannon. This section of the dungeon is a key part in the [[Family Crest]] [[quest]] for obtaining [['perfect' gold ore]].

===The Puzzle===
To enter the section of the dungeon containing the [[Hellhound|hellhounds]], you will first have to solve a lever puzzle. The following is a set of instructions on how to gain access to the room with the hellhounds.

(If you log out at any point before completing the puzzle, you will have to start over.)

# Head to the northern lever located '''outside''' the room and pull it up.
# Head to the southern Lever, located '''inside''' the room and pull it up.
# Return to the northern lever and pull the lever outside the room down.
# Enter the northern room and push the lever in there up.
# Leave the room and pull the one '''outside''' the northern room up.
# Go back to the southern room and pull the '''inside''' lever down.
# Now you are free to enter the room with the hellhounds.

Note: You only have to do the puzzle once to gain access to the hellhounds. If you leave and come back much later you can simply walk into the room via the door and it will not be locked.

==Secret section==
The secret section is discovered during [[The Slug Menace]]. This part of the dungeon is filled with level 45 [[giant lobster]]s. Players fight a level 62 [[Slug Prince]] later in the quest near the end of the hall. There is also an [[Agility]] [[shortcut]], which makes passage through the dungeon much quicker. Finally, at the very end of the dungeon is [[Mother Mallum]]'s lair. The Slug Queen's lair vaguely resembles a bed and is probably where she stayed throughout her years of imprisonment.

*[[Hellhound]]

==Personalities==
